translations: n.女紧身胸衣，女紧身马甲；连衣裙上身（不包括袖子）

phrs.translation: 衣服大身部分, 上身, 女装上身部分

sentences.sentence: If your braided hair has loosened, if the parting of your hair be not straight, or if the ribbons of your bodice be not fastened, do not mind.
sentences.translation: 如果你的发辫若已松开，你的发缝若不平直，你的腰线若未系紧，你也不必介意。

sentences.sentence: I never saw so many darts in a bodice!
sentences.translation: 我从没见过紧身胸衣上纳了这么多的缝褶！

sentences.sentence: RememBEr that if the waist of the bodice is altered the skirt must BE altered also to match.
sentences.translation: 记住如果大身的腰围改动，那么为了相配，裙子腰围也要做相应的改动。
